item.title: Tweet - 1593576112226856961
item.description: Am preparing for #TwitterMigration by downloading my archive. Lol’d as the 2FA on my account was done by email (even though I use an authenticator app) #twitterSecurityFail Next is getting to work it’s magic… then… possibly… ‚ù§Ô∏è 0 | üîÉ 0
